This phone is good and got it in very low price. But this phone doesn't have any fingerprint sensor. Otherwise good.

It's original price is not worth any praise so try to purchase on some card offers or other free bundles. The screen is not full HD but still offers good brightness and color accuracy. Speaker also sounds good enough. Front camera is not for selfies only for video calls but back camera produces satisfactory clicks for entry level. Battery backup is one of the best features of this device. Samsung softwares are all well optimised and my only complaint in this department is the pre-installed bloatwares. UI feels smooth enough and the mediatek processor coupled with 4GB RAM is well suited for daily normal usage. Games are not recommended. Biggest disadvantage of this device is it's in box charger which is only 7.75 watts (5v, 1.55a) that takes about 3 hours for a decent charge.

As expected in this price range the camera performance is average.

Brief Feedback: Budget phone with more RAM in less price, Used for day, feel quite fast
Review Text: Budget Phone:Samsung brand phone with budget price and good storage. Similar phones from other brand also available but somehow I felt this phone did not give any lag even using for a day.Battery: On full charge it lasted upto 65% for 3 movies on Netflix and  video quality also felt upto HD level.Smooth User interface: being Samsung it‚Äôs obviously smooth and quite faster as expected.Speaker: Not so like surround sound like a basic iPhone SE but felt it‚Äôs quite okay like a basic speaker. But on call, speaker seems to be quite loud and clear.Camera: Can‚Äôt expect much from camera because of only being 13 MP but it‚Äôs okay. In good daylight pics seems to be quite good but not in nightlife.Build Quality:Build quality is okay okay in this segment phone, just like other Samsung low-end phone. But a metal back case would have been good.Biometric: Only FaceID, no fingerprint sensor.RAM: Shows 4 GB, not sure how 8 GB works but it‚Äôs virtual 4 GB that‚Äôs what I learnt. But for phone like this 4 GB also works smooth.Screen size: feels very big, good for watching movies and gaming. Feels super HD quality on playing 4K videos.Storage:64 GB is quite a lot (imagine when iPhone use to come in 16 GB storage, so expensive). Massive storage for camera pics also it‚Äôs expandable.
